description: gray thumbs up icon in the comment action bar, located between the replies counter and thumbs down icon

metadata.thought: I need to locate the gray thumbs-up icon within the comment action bar of the third comment by @GymRat-m7m. This icon is positioned between the replies counter and the thumbs-down icon, as described in the task. Once identified, I will click on it to register my approval or like for that comment.
